channel.title: cine on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cine on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Sitting by Cine
item.description: 18:44 Wednesday 19 August 2015 JST Actually, her name is Francine, so “Cine” is pronounced “seen” as an easier option for Japanese speakers to say than フランシーン. We just finished lessons in Fukuura for JB. Chris was supposed to teach, but he’s apparently not fully back from vacation haha. Francine seems to always have creative fun lessons for her classes. Plus she just went through Berlitz training and said she learned a lot.
